Hello This is webpack info to create bundel of application.

Steps To Start (basics)

1. In package.json create a build script of webpack and run command npm run build. it will create main.js in dist

2. Add this file in script tag of html file

3. Create a js file in src and add some function to it

4. Import it to index and call function

5. Now delete build and type command npm run build. it will create minified version of all files in main.js

6. Now run the app on browser and check console. You have created webpack bundle appliction which is minified version of application.

Steps to create webpack config

1. Create Webpack config in root folder

2. Add configs to module.export.

3. Set 'mode' option to 'development' or 'production' to enable defaults for each environment.

4. Not delete main.js and create another build. now you will see the changes in file of main.js.
